title: Michelle Pfeiffer Worries Los Angeles Will No Longer Be an Industry Town: ‘You Need to Bring Back Tax Incentives’ - Variety
content: Michelle Pfeiffer is currently filming “Margo’s Got Money Problems,” the Apple TV+ series adaptation of the bestselling novel co-starring Nicole Kidman and Elle Fanning, in Los Angeles. In the last 2… [+2836 chars]
